verses.verse: <S%H7751>"Roam<s%> to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> through the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> And <S%H7200>look<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H3045>take<s%> <S%H3045>note.<s%> And <S%H1245>seek<s%> in her <S%H7339>open<s%> <S%H7339>squares,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you can <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is one who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> who <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H530>truth,<s%> Then I will <S%H5545>pardon<s%> her.
"And <S%H518>although<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> 'As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%>' <S%H3651>Surely<s%> they <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H8267>falsely.<s%>"

O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> do not Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> look for <S%H530>truth<s%>? Thou hast <S%H5221>smitten<s%> them, [But] they did not <S%H2470>weaken;<s%> Thou hast <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them, But they <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4148>correction.<s%> They have <S%H2388>made<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H2388>harder<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H5553>rock;<s%> They have <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7725>repent.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> "They are <S%H389>only<s%> the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> They are <S%H2973>foolish;<s%> For they do not <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> [Or] the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> of their <S%H430>God.<s%>

"I will <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H1419>great<s%> And will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them, For they <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> [And] the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> of their <S%H430>God.<s%>" But they too, with <S%H3162>one<s%> <S%H3162>accord,<s%> have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> [And] <S%H5423>burst<s%> the <S%H4147>bonds.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> a <S%H9030>lion<s%> from the <S%H9194>forest<s%> shall <S%H5221>slay<s%> them, A <S%H2061>wolf<s%> of the <S%H6160>deserts<s%> shall <S%H7703>destroy<s%> them, A <S%H5246>leopard<s%> is <S%H8245>watching<s%> their <S%H5892>cities.<s%> <S%H3605>Everyone<s%> who <S%H3318>goes<s%> out of them shall be <S%H2963>torn<s%> in <S%H2963>pieces,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H7231>many,<s%> Their <S%H4878>apostasies<s%> are <S%H6105>numerous.<s%>

<S%H335>"Why<s%> should I <S%H5545>pardon<s%> you? Your <S%H1121>sons<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> Me And <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by those who are not <S%H430>gods.<s%> When I had <S%H7646>fed<s%> them to the <S%H7646>full,<s%> They <S%H5003>committed<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> And <S%H1413>trooped<s%> to the harlot's <S%H1004>house.<s%>
"They were well-fed <S%H7904>lusty<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H376>Each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H6670>neighing<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> his neighbor's <S%H802>wife.<s%>

"Shall I not <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [people,]" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "And on a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> as <S%H2088>this<s%> Shall I not <S%H5358>avenge<s%> <S%H5315>Myself<s%>?

<S%H5927>"Go<s%> up through her <S%H9595>vine<s%> <S%H9595>rows<s%> and <S%H7843>destroy,<s%> But do not <S%H6213>execute<s%> a <S%H3617>complete<s%> <S%H3617>destruction;<s%> <S%H5493>Strip<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> her <S%H5189>branches,<s%> For they are not the Lord's.

"For the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> Have <S%H898>dealt<s%> <S%H898>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with Me," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

They have <S%H3584>lied<s%> about the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> And <S%H559>said,<s%> "Not He; <S%H9567>Misfortune<s%> will not <S%H935>come<s%> on us; And we will not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> or <S%H7458>famine.<s%>
"And the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are [as] <S%H7307>wind,<s%> And the <S%H1699>word<s%> is not in them. <S%H3541>Thus<s%> it will be <S%H6213>done<s%> to them!"

<S%H3651>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5414>making<s%> My <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> And <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and it will <S%H398>consume<s%> them.

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H935>bringing<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you from <S%H4801>afar,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> "It is an <S%H386>enduring<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> It is an <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> A <S%H1471>nation<s%> whose <S%H3956>language<s%> you do not <S%H3045>know,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> can you <S%H8085>understand<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> they <S%H1696>say.<s%>
"Their <S%H827>quiver<s%> is like an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6913>grave,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> of them are <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men.<s%>

"And they will <S%H398>devour<s%> your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> and your <S%H3899>food;<s%> They will <S%H398>devour<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> They will <S%H398>devour<s%> your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds;<s%> They will <S%H398>devour<s%> your <S%H1612>vines<s%> and your <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>trees;<s%> They will <S%H7567>demolish<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> your <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H982>trust.<s%>
"Yet <S%H1571>even<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "I will not <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H3617>complete<s%> <S%H3617>destruction.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8478>'Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> to us?' then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, 'As you have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> Me and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> in a <S%H776>land<s%> that is not yours.'
<S%H5046>"Declare<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> And <S%H8085>proclaim<s%> it in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H8085>'Hear<s%> <S%H384>this,<s%> O <S%H5530>foolish<s%> and <S%H369>senseless<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> Who have <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but <S%H7200>see<s%> not; Who have <S%H241>ears,<s%> but <S%H8085>hear<s%> not.

'Do you not <S%H3372>fear<s%> Me?' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> 'Do you not <S%H9123>tremble<s%> in My <S%H6440>presence<s%>? For I have <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H2344>sand<s%> as a <S%H1366>boundary<s%> for the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> An <S%H5769>eternal<s%> <S%H2706>decree,<s%> so it <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> it. Though the <S%H1530>waves<s%> <S%H1607>toss,<s%> yet they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201>prevail;<s%> Though they <S%H1993>roar,<s%> yet they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> it.

'But <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1961>has<s%> a <S%H5637>stubborn<s%> and <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> They have <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> and <S%H1980>departed.<s%>

'They do not <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart,<s%> "Let us <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> Who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> in its <S%H6256>season,<s%> Both the <S%H3138>autumn<s%> <S%H3138>rain<s%> and the <S%H4456>spring<s%> <S%H4456>rain,<s%> Who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> for us The <S%H2708>appointed<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> of the <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>"
'Your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have <S%H5186>turned<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5186>away,<s%> And your <S%H9128>sins<s%> have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> from you.

'For <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>men<s%> are <S%H4672>found<s%> among My <S%H5971>people,<s%> They <S%H7789>watch<s%> like <S%H3353>fowlers<s%> <S%H7918>lying<s%> in <S%H7918>wait;<s%> They <S%H7843>set<s%> a <S%H4889>trap,<s%> They <S%H3920>catch<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

'Like a <S%H3619>cage<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5775>birds,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> their <S%H1004>houses<s%> are <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they have <S%H1431>become<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%> and <S%H6238>rich.<s%>

'They are <S%H8080>fat,<s%> they are <S%H6245>sleek,<s%> They <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5674>excel<s%> in <S%H1697>deeds<s%> of <S%H9563>wickedness;<s%> They do not <S%H1777>plead<s%> the <S%H1779>cause,<s%> The <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H3490>orphan,<s%> that they may <S%H6743>prosper;<s%> And they do not <S%H8199>defend<s%> the <S%H4941>rights<s%> of the <S%H34>poor.<s%>

'Shall I not <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [people?'] <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'On a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> as <S%H2088>this<s%> Shall I not <S%H5358>avenge<s%> <S%H5315>Myself<s%>?'
"An <S%H8047>appalling<s%> and <S%H8186>horrible<s%> <S%H8186>thing<s%> Has <S%H1961>happened<s%> in the land: <S%H776><s%>

The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7287>rule<s%> on their [own] <S%H3027>authority;<s%> And My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> it <S%H3651>so!<s%> But <S%H4100>what<s%> will you <S%H6213>do<s%> at the <S%H319>end<s%> of it?
